ghostPost.title: Post launch update: July 24th, 2017
ghostPost.excerpt: One week in the books and so much more to do. BRING IT ON!
ghostPost.custom_excerpt: One week in the books and so much more to do. BRING IT ON!
ghostPost.plaintext:
One week in the books and so much more to do. BRING IT ON!
Particl successfully launches pure Proof of Stake blockchain the hard way
Did you know? Most Proof of Stake (PoS) chains are hybrid Proof of Work
(PoW)/PoS chains. That is because it’s easier to have miner nodes doing all the
work to secure the network and then switch over to a staking system than to
begin with staking nodes reserving their coins to secure the network. The
probability for forked or hijacked chains is high until the majority of tokens
are securing the network by staking. The Particl Team planned weeks in advance
and cycled through scenarios using testnet to ensure the smoothest launch
possible. One week later, the forethought paid off.

PART Distributed
Particl Blockchain launched Monday July 17, 2017 and every contributor who
created a Particl wallet ahead
[https://particl.news/reminder-create-your-particl-wallet-%EF%B8%8F-49cfe8871346] 
of mainnet launch and had PART token balances on Particl.io [https://particl.io] 
received their tokens within the first 100 blocks after Particl genesis block. A
number of PART tokens remain to be distributed manually by the team. If you
contributed to our project and still haven’t received your PART tokens please
read below. I’ve summed up 3 groups who still need some work done to receive
their PART tokens.

PART yet to be distributed
The team will be doing a weekly distribution batch every Wednesday for the
following groups of contributors yet to receive their PART tokens.

1 Contributors who have a balance on Particl.io but still need to create their
Particl wallet and accept the funding round Terms.

 * Please login to https://particl.io. We have a new page setup along with a new
   video to help guide you through the steps to gain access to your PART
 * Complete this by Wednesday and you will be included in this week’s batch!

2 Contributors who needed to have extra SDC and/or BTC converted to PART after
the funding round ended due to overfunding the project or sending tokens to the
transparency addresses by accident.

 * If you’ve created your Particl wallet already and only waiting for the team
   to distribute the coins then you don’t have to do anything, you’ll be
   included in this week’s Wednesday batch
 * If you’ve yet to create your Particl wallet and accept Terms of the funding
   round you need to:

> 1. Please login to https://particl.io. We have a new page setup along with a new
video to help guide you through the steps to gain access to your PART2. Complete
this by Wednesday and you will be included in this week’s batch!

3 Claimants who have been approved by the team to meet the qualifications of the
Particl Community Initiative #1 (Group 1)

 * Please login to https://particl.io. We have a new page setup along with a new
   video to help guide you through the steps to gain access to your PART
 * Complete this by Wednesday and you will be included in this week’s batch!

PART + BITTREX
Bittrex — The Next Generation Digital Currency Exchange added the Particl (PART)
token to their impressive list of crypto currency project tokens trading on
their market. Bittrex is one of the largest digital currency exchanges by volume
and many of you in our community already use them as your platform of choice. We
wanted to thank Bittrex for adding PART so our community, who is also your
community, can benefit from all you offer the ecosystem.

PART + CryptoID
Particl Team hosts our official Particl explorer built on Insight here: 
https://explorer.particl.io/

CryptoID or “Chainz” worked with our team to operate a node for their extensive
selection of data points across the Particl blockchain. This second Particl
blockchain explorer provides insight to staking, ownership, distribution and
much more. You can find it here: https://chainz.cryptoid.info/part/

PART + Coinmarket Cap
One of the best tools on the web for crypto currency enthusiasts is
CryptoCurrency Market Capitalizations. This long running site quickly gives you
a look into markets, projects and valuations on every cryptocurrency project in
the ecosystem. Particl has a page on there: 
https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/particl/


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Interested in helping build Particl?
It is exciting when passion in the community manifests itself in unexpected
ways. Whether it’s helping break the testnet, bending tools like Angular and
Electron to your will or being really, really good at graphics and writing, our 
SLACK [http://slack.particl.io/] and RIOT
[https://riot.im/app/#/room/#particl:matrix.org] community channels are great
places to get involved.

Are you a professional, looking for new job opportunities?
We are actively seeking passionate, driven creatives in the following career
paths:

 * C++ Developer [https://particl.io/careers.html#c01]
 * Junior Developer [https://particl.io/careers.html#c02]
 * Social Media Coordinator [https://particl.io/careers.html#c03]

Please be sure to subscribe to this blog to stay up-to-date with the latest
news.

Thank you

Particl Team
ghostPost.html:
One week in the books and so much more to do. BRING IT ON!

Particl successfully launches pure Proof of Stake blockchain the hard way

Did you know? Most Proof of Stake (PoS) chains are hybrid Proof of Work (PoW)/PoS chains. That is because it’s easier to have miner nodes doing all the work to secure the network and then switch over to a staking system than to begin with staking nodes reserving their coins to secure the network. The probability for forked or hijacked chains is high until the majority of tokens are securing the network by staking. The Particl Team planned weeks in advance and cycled through scenarios using testnet to ensure the smoothest launch possible. One week later, the forethought paid off.

PART Distributed

Particl Blockchain launched Monday July 17, 2017 and every contributor who created a Particl wallet ahead of mainnet launch and had PART token balances on Particl.io received their tokens within the first 100 blocks after Particl genesis block. A number of PART tokens remain to be distributed manually by the team. If you contributed to our project and still haven’t received your PART tokens please read below. I’ve summed up 3 groups who still need some work done to receive their PART tokens.

PART yet to be distributed

The team will be doing a weekly distribution batch every Wednesday for the following groups of contributors yet to receive their PART tokens.

1 Contributors who have a balance on Particl.io but still need to create their Particl wallet and accept the funding round Terms.

  • Please login to https://particl.io. We have a new page setup along with a new video to help guide you through the steps to gain access to your PART
  • Complete this by Wednesday and you will be included in this week’s batch!

2 Contributors who needed to have extra SDC and/or BTC converted to PART after the funding round ended due to overfunding the project or sending tokens to the transparency addresses by accident.

  • If you’ve created your Particl wallet already and only waiting for the team to distribute the coins then you don’t have to do anything, you’ll be included in this week’s Wednesday batch
  • If you’ve yet to create your Particl wallet and accept Terms of the funding round you need to:
1. Please login to https://particl.io. We have a new page setup along with a new video to help guide you through the steps to gain access to your PART2. Complete this by Wednesday and you will be included in this week’s batch!

3 Claimants who have been approved by the team to meet the qualifications of the Particl Community Initiative #1 (Group 1)

  • Please login to https://particl.io. We have a new page setup along with a new video to help guide you through the steps to gain access to your PART
  • Complete this by Wednesday and you will be included in this week’s batch!

PART + BITTREX

Bittrex — The Next Generation Digital Currency Exchange added the Particl (PART) token to their impressive list of crypto currency project tokens trading on their market. Bittrex is one of the largest digital currency exchanges by volume and many of you in our community already use them as your platform of choice. We wanted to thank Bittrex for adding PART so our community, who is also your community, can benefit from all you offer the ecosystem.

PART + CryptoID

Particl Team hosts our official Particl explorer built on Insight here: https://explorer.particl.io/

CryptoID or “Chainz” worked with our team to operate a node for their extensive selection of data points across the Particl blockchain. This second Particl blockchain explorer provides insight to staking, ownership, distribution and much more. You can find it here: https://chainz.cryptoid.info/part/

PART + Coinmarket Cap

One of the best tools on the web for crypto currency enthusiasts is CryptoCurrency Market Capitalizations. This long running site quickly gives you a look into markets, projects and valuations on every cryptocurrency project in the ecosystem. Particl has a page on there: https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/particl/

Interested in helping build Particl?

It is exciting when passion in the community manifests itself in unexpected ways. Whether it’s helping break the testnet, bending tools like Angular and Electron to your will or being really, really good at graphics and writing, our SLACK and RIOT community channels are great places to get involved.

Are you a professional, looking for new job opportunities?

We are actively seeking passionate, driven creatives in the following career paths:

  • C++ Developer
  • Junior Developer
  • Social Media Coordinator

Please be sure to subscribe to this blog to stay up-to-date with the latest news.

Thank you

Particl Team

Particl successfully launches pure Proof of Stake blockchain the hard way

Did you know? Most Proof of Stake (PoS) chains are hybrid Proof of Work (PoW)/PoS chains. That is because it’s easier to have miner nodes doing all the work to secure the network and then switch over to a staking system than to begin with staking nodes reserving their coins to secure the network. The probability for forked or hijacked chains is high until the majority of tokens are securing the network by staking. The Particl Team planned weeks in advance and cycled through scenarios using testnet to ensure the smoothest launch possible. One week later, the forethought paid off.

PART Distributed

Particl Blockchain launched Monday July 17, 2017 and every contributor who created a Particl wallet ahead of mainnet launch and had PART token balances on Particl.io received their tokens within the first 100 blocks after Particl genesis block. A number of PART tokens remain to be distributed manually by the team. If you contributed to our project and still haven’t received your PART tokens please read below. I’ve summed up 3 groups who still need some work done to receive their PART tokens.

PART yet to be distributed

The team will be doing a weekly distribution batch every Wednesday for the following groups of contributors yet to receive their PART tokens.

1 Contributors who have a balance on Particl.io but still need to create their Particl wallet and accept the funding round Terms.

  • Please login to https://particl.io. We have a new page setup along with a new video to help guide you through the steps to gain access to your PART
  • Complete this by Wednesday and you will be included in this week’s batch!

2 Contributors who needed to have extra SDC and/or BTC converted to PART after the funding round ended due to overfunding the project or sending tokens to the transparency addresses by accident.

  • If you’ve created your Particl wallet already and only waiting for the team to distribute the coins then you don’t have to do anything, you’ll be included in this week’s Wednesday batch
  • If you’ve yet to create your Particl wallet and accept Terms of the funding round you need to:
1. Please login to https://particl.io. We have a new page setup along with a new video to help guide you through the steps to gain access to your PART2. Complete this by Wednesday and you will be included in this week’s batch!

3 Claimants who have been approved by the team to meet the qualifications of the Particl Community Initiative #1 (Group 1)

  • Please login to https://particl.io. We have a new page setup along with a new video to help guide you through the steps to gain access to your PART
  • Complete this by Wednesday and you will be included in this week’s batch!

PART + BITTREX

Bittrex — The Next Generation Digital Currency Exchange added the Particl (PART) token to their impressive list of crypto currency project tokens trading on their market. Bittrex is one of the largest digital currency exchanges by volume and many of you in our community already use them as your platform of choice. We wanted to thank Bittrex for adding PART so our community, who is also your community, can benefit from all you offer the ecosystem.

Particl Team hosts our official Particl explorer built on Insight here: https://explorer.particl.io/

CryptoID or “Chainz” worked with our team to operate a node for their extensive selection of data points across the Particl blockchain. This second Particl blockchain explorer provides insight to staking, ownership, distribution and much more. You can find it here: https://chainz.cryptoid.info/part/

PART + Coinmarket Cap

One of the best tools on the web for crypto currency enthusiasts is CryptoCurrency Market Capitalizations. This long running site quickly gives you a look into markets, projects and valuations on every cryptocurrency project in the ecosystem. Particl has a page on there: https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/particl/

Interested in helping build Particl?

It is exciting when passion in the community manifests itself in unexpected ways. Whether it’s helping break the testnet, bending tools like Angular and Electron to your will or being really, really good at graphics and writing, our SLACK and RIOT community channels are great places to get involved.

Are you a professional, looking for new job opportunities?

We are actively seeking passionate, driven creatives in the following career paths:

  • C++ Developer
  • Junior Developer
  • Social Media Coordinator

Please be sure to subscribe to this blog to stay up-to-date with the latest news.

Thank you

Particl Team

prev.title: 1st manual distribution of PART is complete.
prev.plaintext:
Overfunders & Group 1 Claimants
In our last blog post
[https://particl.news/post-launch-update-july-24th-2017-419f55ddc89f] we broke
down the remaining contributors waiting for their PART tokens. Every Wednesday
we are doing a combined distribution to everyone who creates their Particl
wallet that week. Last night was our first batch and all over-funders
[https://particl.news/tokens-holders-and-next-steps-part-1-b9d7cd7e7887] and
approved claimants from our Community Initiative #1
[https://particl.news/a-community-driven-initiative-e26724100c3a] who set up
their receiving address should have their PART.

Still waiting for your PART?
Please read Post launch update: July 24th, 2017
[https://particl.news/post-launch-update-july-24th-2017-419f55ddc89f] to see the
groups we’ve identified and the steps you need to take to secure your PART
token.

? Our next manual distribution will be Wednesday, August 3rd. Don’t wait any
longer, set up your wallet
[https://particl.news/guide-how-to-generate-your-particl-exchange-passphrase-1fd78ba36fd1] 
and get your tokens!

PART tokens not showing up in your wallet?
The best assistance you can get is from the Particl Community members in our
#help slack channel. I would encourage you to signup [http://slack.particl.io/] 
and we will get you straightened away faster than you can track a bitcoin
across
the blockchain [http://blog.wizsec.jp/2017/07/breaking-open-mtgox-1.html].

Thank you

Particl Team
prev.html:
Overfunders & Group 1 Claimants

In our last blog post we broke down the remaining contributors waiting for their PART tokens. Every Wednesday we are doing a combined distribution to everyone who creates their Particl wallet that week. Last night was our first batch and all over-funders and approved claimants from our Community Initiative #1 who set up their receiving address should have their PART.

Still waiting for your PART?

Please read Post launch update: July 24th, 2017 to see the groups we’ve identified and the steps you need to take to secure your PART token.

? Our next manual distribution will be Wednesday, August 3rd. Don’t wait any longer, set up your wallet and get your tokens!

PART tokens not showing up in your wallet?

The best assistance you can get is from the Particl Community members in our #help slack channel. I would encourage you to signup and we will get you straightened away faster than you can track a bitcoin across the blockchain.

Thank you

Particl Team

next.title: Particl Launch Update: July 17th, 2017
next.plaintext:
Today is a good day!
Particl Blockchain is LIVE thanks to all involved, especially to our
contributors.

Getting started:
1First, head over to our Github for the official wallet releases.

Please only use these official compiles, don’t use any other source for your
wallet releases or click on links quoted in forums. This is an easy attack
vector for nefarious individuals to prey on the less experienced user.

 * Official link to Particl wallets: 
   https://github.com/particl/particl-core/releases

2Second, import your pre-generated Particl Wallet.

Community member B.B.2K has once again created a simple video walk-thru of how
to import your mnemonic keys to begin receiving your PART distribution.

3Third, allow Particl blockchain to advance 100–200 blocks into existence before
seeing total balance.

Please wait patiently as the PART tokens for our seed funders is distributed
automatically by the Particl Blockchain. In our testnet versions, token
distribution happened within 100 blocks or 200 minutes (2 minute blocks).

 * Particl Explorer: https://explorer.particl.io/

Thank you

Particl Team
